channel.title: Req, site banner
channel.description:
Since all of my photoshop and ms paint programs got delete ill just see if someone can help me here :p
Image: anything really just somthing that matches my site
Text: Private Server Help
Font: You pick ;)
Size: 750x 150
URL: http://z10.invisionfree.com/privateserverhelp/index.php?act=idx

item.title: Req, site banner

item.title: Req, site banner
item.dc:creator: @usernamelol .Fusion
item.description:
@usernamelol wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:8, topic:19516”][quote author=Got_Shine link=topic=29623.msg350225#msg350225 date=1161845442]
I love the background. It the C4D makes all the difference. Change the text a bit though. Make it a white Ariel and give it a drop shadow, maybe fade the opacity of it.

just mo.
[/quote]

Fuck, I knew I should of kept the .psd. I’m so sorry usernamelol. I always forget to save the .psd :([/quote]
?? Its fine its on my site now

Read full topic
